parse.title: Music of Middle-Earth, Vol. 1: From the Shire to Rivendell

wikitext.*:
'''''Music of Middle-Earth, Vol. 1: From the Shire to Rivendell''''' is the first full-length album by [[Gene Hargrove]], released in 2001.
